name: Cost-to-Serve Insight Agent
tagline: Reveals true cost-to-serve for better pricing and prioritization
overview: The Cost-to-Serve Insight Agent analyzes operational data to reveal the true cost of serving different customers, products, and channels. It helps identify profitability drivers and opportunities to optimize cost structure while maintaining service levels.
whatItDoes: Calculates cost-to-serve by customer, product, and channel
prompts: What's the true cost-to-serve for this customer segment?
Which customers are below profitability threshold?
What's driving the high logistics cost for this region?
Compare cost-to-serve across our distribution channels
Show me cost-to-serve trends for the aftermarket business

impact.description: Cost reduction opportunities identified in pilot

guardrails: Cost allocations validated by finance team
Customer decisions require commercial team involvement
Does not recommend customer termination autonomously
Pricing changes follow standard approval processes
Sensitive customer data access controlled by role
